name: Deliverance: Thrones in Purgatory
description:
Splendid life my exalted Donators. I am referred to as Uri, the Demon Butler, whose sole purpose is to cater to your adult entertainment fantasies to the best of my abilities. My current work only consists of Deliverance. An Adult Visual Novel with RPG, Tycoon, and Sim Management Mechanics.

This game will always be free! I will always be grateful to my donators and truly feel indebted to them for allowing me to continue making entertainment for everyone. For that, I will do what I can to provide appropriate benefits for those who spend money on me.

However.

I never want anyone to feel obligated to pay me for anything I publish. All entertainment published trough me will eventually be free, as I want to make sure to provide the highest quality that you all deserve!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Deliverance Thrones in Purgatory

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Your soul floating into an abyss, you awake in a volatile unknown world. Your mind at constant risk of breaking apart, your body desired by entities lurking around you. Not alone, others struggle within the anomaly that is this place. Others who flow in this abyss with you, allow you a choice. A choice to deliver them. 

To deliver them from the evil that plagues the world around. 

Or. 

To deliver them from the morals that restrain them from indulging in depravity. 

Do you want a Wholesome relaxing experience, where you leisurely romance partners suffering from the ordeals that mirror our everyday life? 

Manage the survival of the weak and establish a Nation under your name?

Do you want to create War Atrocities at a scale that would make Hitler cry?

Maybe you hate the despicable horrors around you and wish to bring a sense of Justice to those around you?

This game caters to the desire of the player, allowing you to experience the style of game you wish to play. If you answered yes to any of the above, this game is for you. 

Gameplay:

- First Person POV

- Sandbox Mechanics

- Visual Novel Story Progression with Dating Sim Aspects

- Morality, Depravity, and Insanity Development

- RPG Status and Quest Progression 

- Squad Based RPG Elements

- Sim Management Systems

- Flash Game Inspired Mechanics and Mini-Games to Enhance Gameplay

- Powered by Renpy Engine 

* Protagonist can choose their gender and genitalia, the scenes will change to incorporate the player’s anatomy. 

Planned Features:

- Main plotline with 5 different official endings 

- Official Characters With their own individual plotlines

- Various Side-quests, Jobs, and Mercenary systems 

- Unique Randomly Generated Characters and Monsters

- Recruit almost any character species you encounter 

- Morally questionable experiences

- Dynamic Areas to Explore and Adventure

- Individual and Squad Based First Person POV Battle System

- Squad Inventory Management Systems

- Autonomous Inventory System

- Physical, Mental and Magical Stats Systems

- Interactive Economy. 

- Player Owned Tycoon

- Dating/Training System 

Current Feature:

- Roughly 45 Minute Introduction to the Gameplay Style and Art.

- Introduction to the main cast.

- Introduction to the movement system.

- Introduction to the interaction system.

- Introduction to the GUI, Music, Quest, Affinity and Stat systems.
